title: Lets play a game: Guess whos that Gder
body:
Alright so how the game works is if the person guessed the right person, he would be the next one to start detailing on which next Gder to guess on, Ill start

-I Find everything broken except for adc's
-I am Biased as hell towards champs I main and defend them from people disagreemnts
-I main a very boring adc champ

Who am I?
